intro.description:
This cheat sheet shows you how to create a view that joins data from 2 sources.
Note: These steps are sequential and require you to complete or skip each step before being allowed to Perform, Complete or Skip the next step.
To learn more about using cheat sheets click the help icon above.
Press "Click to Begin" button below to start.

item.title: Create View Model
item.description:
This following action creates an empty view model.
============================================================
-- > Press "Click to Perform" button below to create a view model.
-- >
-- > You may skip this step if you have already created your view model.
============================================================

item.title: Create View Table
item.description:
This following action creates
============================================================
-- > Press "Click to Perform" button below to create a view table.
-- >
-- > You may skip this step if you have already created a view table.
============================================================
